scouter.hero_desc: Visualize your network's true performance. Detect bufferbloat, verify VPN integrity, and monitor jitter in real-time.
scouter.ip_desc: Detect WebRTC leaks instantly. Verify if your VPN is truly protecting your identity.
scouter.jitter_desc: Real-time stability monitoring. Visualization of latency fluctuation optimized for gamers.
scouter.bloat_desc: Measure latency under load. Identify lag spikes that occur during heavy downloads.
scouter.analysis_title: Why simple speed tests aren't enough.
analysis_points: Gaming lag even with high speeds?

warp.hero_desc: Transfer files directly between devices without limits. No servers, no tracking, just pure peer-to-peer speed.
warp.secure_desc: Files stream directly from sender to receiver. Data never touches a cloud server.
warp.speed_desc: Utilizes local network (LAN) when available for gigabit-speed transfers.
warp.cross_desc: Works on iOS, Android, Windows, Mac. Just scan the QR code to connect.
warp.pwa_desc: Warp Share runs entirely in your browser using WebRTC technology. No installation or registration required, start sharing instantly.

detail.description: Convert video files into high-quality GIF animations. Powered by FFmpeg.wasm, all processing happens entirely within your browser. Your videos are never uploaded to the internet, ensuring maximum privacy and fast performance.
features: Customizable frame rate and resize options
steps: Drag and drop your video file into the converter
Adjust parameters such as start/end time and loop settings
Click 'Start Conversion' and wait for processing
Download your generated GIF

faqs.q: Is there a file size limit?
faqs.a: It depends on your device's memory (RAM). Short clips are converted effortlessly.
The browser extracts and encodes frames locally. Faster devices provide quicker results.

detail.description: Seamlessly convert between major video formats including MP4, WebM, MOV, and AVI. Since no large files are sent to a server, it's the safest way to process private videos.
features: Support for major video and audio codecs
Completely free with no hidden limits
steps: Upload your video file (it remains local to your browser)
Select your target format (MP4, WebM, etc.)
Confirm settings and click 'Execute'
Save the converted file to your device

faqs.a: Yes, by selecting an audio format like MP3 as your output target.

detail.description: An AI assistant that allows you to interact with various specialists (personas). Instead of just answering questions, the selected persona utilizes its expert knowledge to 'think' and provide high-quality advice and solutions.
features: Diverse expert personas ranging from Culinary and Business to IT
Deep-diving dialogues that uncover the user's hidden intentions
Advanced reasoning powered by latest AI models like Google Gemini
Concrete and actionable responses ready for professional use
steps: Select the ideal persona (expert) for your specific topic
Enter your question or problem naturally
The persona processes and generates a response from its unique perspective
Follow up with more questions to deepen the conversation and reach a solution

faqs.q: Is this a tool for creating prompts?
faqs.a: No. It is a conversational AI tool where personas provide direct answers and solutions to your queries.

detail.description: Instantly create warm, nostalgic retro photos. Using your browser's camera API, it applies filters that recreate the beautiful 'imperfections' of analog film photography.
features: Analog grain, light leaks, and automatic color grading
Zero data storage for total privacy
steps: Giver camera permission and frame your subject
Select your preferred filter or texture
Hit the shutter (processed instantly with sound)
Save and share your retro masterpiece

faqs.a: Yes, please use the 'Image Editor' tool for advanced filtering of your existing photos.

detail.description: A comprehensive suite for cropping, resizing, whitening, and enhancing images online. Simple operations with professional-grade results, all without leaving your browser.
features: Batch processing for multiple files (Coming Soon)
steps: Load your image file
Apply edits using intuitive sliders and tools
Check the live preview for the final result
Export in your desired format

faqs.a: Modern browsers can typically process HEIC files automatically.

detail.description: Warp Share is a portal that transcends device barriers. Send heavy videos or sensitive documents 'directly' to your recipient without trusting a middleman server. Experience the power of P2P technology.
steps: Drop files on the sender device and show the QR code
Scan the QR code with the receiver device
Transfer starts once the P2P connection is established
Save the received files

faqs.a: Yes. Encrypted via DTLS, making it theoretically impossible for servers to peek at your data.

detail.description: A professional-grade diagnostic tool focused on 'Quality' rather than just speed. It visualizes Jitter and Bufferbloat—the true culprits behind gaming lag and video call drops.
steps: Click 'Start Diagnostics'
Monitor load latency during the speed test
Check your results and network grade (A+ to F)
Review specific advice for any detected issues

faqs.q: How is this different from normal speed tests?
faqs.a: Normal tests measure 'peak speed', while Net Scouter measures 'stability'. Essential for identifying gaming lag.

detail.description: AI automatically identifies people and objects in images and removes the background cleanly. All processing happens entirely within your browser, so your photos are never uploaded to the internet, making it safe and fast to use.
features: 100% Client-side (Your photos never leave your device)
Precise background removal using the latest 'IS-Net' AI model
Instant side-by-side preview to compare changes
steps: Upload the image you want to remove the background from
Click the 'Remove Background' button to start AI identification
Wait a few seconds for the AI to process (progress is shown)
Download and save the finished transparent image

faqs.q: Is my image data stored anywhere?
faqs.a: No. All processing, from AI computation to image output, occurs on your device. Nothing is sent to a server, so you can use it even for sensitive photos.
We support PNG, JPG, and WEBP. Output is always provided in transparent PNG format.

magic-eraser.title: Magic Eraser
magic-eraser.subtitle: Remove unwanted objects instantly
magic-eraser.upload_desc: Select an image to remove objects from
magic-eraser.instruction: Paint over objects to remove and click Erase.
magic-eraser.limitations_desc: This tool uses a lightweight browser-based algorithm. It works best for removing small objects, blemishes, or text. It is NOT suitable for removing people or large complex objects.

detail.description: A tool for erasing small unwanted objects from photos. It uses the 'Telea algorithm' to naturally fill the brushed area with surrounding pixels. This tool is not designed for erasing large objects—it works best on small targets that fit within the brush size. All processing happens entirely in your browser, ensuring your images are never uploaded to any server.
features: 100% Client-side (Your photos never leave your device)
Best for removing small unwanted objects
Intuitive brush tool for marking areas to erase
steps: Upload an image containing the object you want to remove
Adjust the brush size and trace over the target once (repeated strokes cause smearing)
Click 'Execute Erase' to start processing
Review the result; if unsatisfied, use 'Erase More' for additional editing
Download and save the finished image

faqs.a: No. This tool is designed for small targets that fit within the brush size. Erasing large objects will leave noticeable artifacts.

faqs.q: Can I brush over the same area multiple times?
faqs.a: We recommend tracing only once. Like a real eraser, repeated strokes over the same spot cause 'smearing' and unnatural results. Use the 'Erase More' feature for iterative adjustments instead.
We support PNG, JPG, and WEBP. Output is always provided in PNG format.
